bug.author: anyj0527
bug.summary: [Android/tflite] Failed to invoke tflite model with nnapi.
bug.description:
The test keeps failing by crash. (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/blob/for-next/api/android/api/src/androidTest/java/org/nnsuite/nnstreamer/APITestSingleShot.java#L272>https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/blob/for-next/api/android/api/src/androidTest/java/org/nnsuite/nnstreamer/APITestSingleShot.java#L272</denchmark-link> ) Currently, tflite (1.13.1) utilizes nnapi by default: (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/blob/master/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite.cc#L574>https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/blob/master/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite.cc#L574</denchmark-link> ) If I modify this line with use_nnapi = FALSE;, the failures do not occur. This may be related with file access permission. Test failure log: <denchmark-code>... 2020-09-21 16:03:25.046 4220-4323/? D/nnstreamer: Framework = tensorflow-lite 2020-09-21 16:03:25.046 4220-4323/? I/GLib: nnapi = 1, accl = cpu 2020-09-21 16:03:25.047 684-684/? D/keymaster_swd: keymaster_swd [WRN] (swd_run_cb:249) swd_finish() returns 0 2020-09-21 16:03:25.047 4220-4323/? W/nnstreamer: The number of tensor name is mismatched in filter. 2020-09-21 16:03:25.047 4220-4323/? W/nnstreamer: The number of tensor name is mismatched in filter. 2020-09-21 16:03:25.047 1053-4566/? D/keystore: [FINISH::end] 2020-09-21 16:03:25.048 4220-4323/? E/NeuralNetworks: SecFeature = 3 2020-09-21 16:03:25.050 4220-4323/? D/NativeHcmServiceManager: [NativeHcm] BpSemHcmManager::BpSemHcmManager() 2020-09-21 16:03:25.050 1055-12636/? I/HcmInfo::HcmManagerService: ctc pid=4220, uid=10131, Package Name:org.nnsuite.nnstreamer.test 2020-09-21 16:03:25.051 1055-2553/? D/CustomFrequencyManagerService: acquireDVFSLockLocked : type : DVFS_MIN_LIMIT frequency : 2457600 uid : 1000 pid : 1055 pkgName : hcm@81 2020-09-21 16:03:25.060 4220-4323/? I/TypeManager: Failed to read /vendor/etc/nnapi_extensions_app_allowlist ; No app allowlisted for vendor extensions use. 2020-09-21 16:03:25.061 4220-4323/? E/nnstreamer.tes: getSupportedOperations_1_2 failure: Status(EX_TRANSACTION_FAILED): 'FAILED_TRANSACTION: ' 2020-09-21 16:03:25.061 4220-4323/? E/Manager: IDevice::getSupportedOperations returned the error GENERAL_FAILURE 2020-09-21 16:03:25.061 4220-4323/? E/nnstreamer.tes: getSupportedOperations_1_2 failure: Status(EX_TRANSACTION_FAILED): 'FAILED_TRANSACTION: ' 2020-09-21 16:03:25.061 4220-4323/? comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2755>#2755</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

With tflite v1.15.2 and v2.3.0, the test does not crash but give unexpected return value: expected: 3.5f, but was : 0.0f <denchmark-code>2020-09-24 16:13:15.517 13086-13131/org.nnsuite.nnstreamer.test
